name: Ion (LaptopCoder11)
description:
Ion is a minimalistic puzzle game about splitting atoms.

Use Instability, Directions, Limits and Electrons to clear 80 levels across 9 chapters, with each chapter introducing a new concept.

Simple, but challenging puzzles keep you engaged throughout the game.

And for an extra challenge try to speedrun the puzzles with the speedrun timer (if you can find it) or find some secret levels.

Enjoy, and good luck!
